thread.section_title: Adagio Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Stay!!
thread.title_full: Excellent Stay!! - Review of Adagio Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Krystal D
title: Excellent Stay!!
text:
My experience of this hotel was fantastic, beginning to end. Check in went smoothly, by a very nice English speaking gentleman. My apartment was excellent, larger than I had expected for more of a budget place in Europe. I loved having 2 table/chair sets in the room. The bed was comfortable. The hotel was quiet. Great amenities. Secured hotel door - you need either your key to get in or to buzz the front desk. Great location. Walking distance to shopping, Eiffel Tower, metro. Please note that housekeeping is on a weekly basis, but they provide enough towels and toiletries to last, along with cleaning supplies that may be needed (broom, vacuum, dishwasher tabs etc)
Room Tip: I always love higher floors. See more room tips
